channel.title: drunken fist theme update
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "drunken fist theme update"

item.title: Re: drunken fist theme update
item.content:encoded:
@ Anon 71.71.246.241, No one here has any more access to the game than you do. We're just players, and as such, this wiki doesn't respond to every single change in the game as soon as it's made. Changes to the wiki are made as players discover the answers to the questions you're asking.

If there's anything that's not on the wiki, there's a good chance that it's because very few players know about it or because it's very new content and we're all more focused with exploring it than updating things here.

Something will be added eventually, but for now, just be more patient. It's not going to happen immediately.

item.title: Re: drunken fist theme update
item.content:encoded: Bar is here now for anyone who cares. Juice Bar upgrade in villages. Requires Party House.

item.title: Re: drunken fist theme update
item.content:encoded: Now they areâ€¦ but no page on it yet. I'm confused and waiting.

item.title: Re: drunken fist theme update
item.content:encoded: No one knows what juice bonuses are yet. They're related to the Bar, which isn't in the game yet as of this posting.

item.title: drunken fist theme update
item.content:encoded:
i've got the drinken fist theme, and it says "double XP/AP while sparring, activate 'juice' bonuses" i don't know what juice bonuses are but could someone update it please?

also, does anyone know what juice bonuses are? thanks.
